biotools.summary: The CerealESTdb, a user-friendly, searchable, and interactive database has been developed with a primary goal to provide information on assembled and annotated ESTs from four major crop plants, namely wheat, rice, maize, and sorghum under multiple environmental stresses including cold, heat, drought, and salt stress as well as on the application of ABA.

bioschemas.name: CerealESTdb
bioschemas.summary: The CerealESTdb, a user-friendly, searchable, and interactive database has been developed with a primary goal to provide information on assembled and annotated ESTs from four major crop plants, namely wheat, rice, maize, and sorghum under multiple environmental stresses including cold, heat, drought, and salt stress as well as on the application of ABA.
